metadata.name: Engraver Gold Standard Combo
metadata.description: Single Engraver line reaching A Bao A Qu + Caesar endboard

starting_hand.notes: Only Engraver is engine. Other 4 cards can be anything (non-engine filler)

field.name: A Bao A Qu, the Lightless Shadow

graveyard_resources.name: Fiendsmith's Lacrima
graveyard_resources.notes: Can SS Agnumday on opponent's turn

graveyard_resources.name: Fiendsmith's Agnumday
graveyard_resources.notes: Can revive and equip to Rextremende

endboard.description: A Bao A Qu + Caesar on field. Lacrima in GY can summon Agnumday which equips to Rextremende with protection on opponent's turn.

extra_deck.name: A Bao A Qu, the Lightless Shadow

combo_steps.effect: Discard this card; add 1 Fiendsmith Spell/Trap from Deck to hand
combo_steps.result: Engraver to GY, search Tract to hand

combo_steps.effect: Add 1 Fiendsmith monster from Deck to hand, then discard 1 card
combo_steps.result: Add Fabled Lurrie, discard Lurrie as cost

combo_steps.effect: When discarded, Special Summon this card
combo_steps.result: Lurrie SS to field

combo_steps.effect: Link-1 using 1 LIGHT Fiend
combo_steps.result: Requiem on field, Lurrie to GY

combo_steps.effect: Tribute this card; SS 1 Fiendsmith monster from hand or Deck
combo_steps.result: Requiem tributes self, SS Lacrima the Crimson Tears from Deck

combo_steps.action: Lacrima the Crimson Tears on-summon trigger
combo_steps.effect: When Normal/Special Summoned: Send 1 Fiendsmith card from Deck to GY
combo_steps.result: Send Fiendsmith Kyrie from Deck to GY

combo_steps.effect: Target 1 LIGHT non-Link Fiend you control; equip this card from GY to it (+600 ATK)
combo_steps.result: Requiem equips to Lacrima the Crimson Tears

combo_steps.effect: Banish this card from GY; Fusion Summon using monsters you control and equipped Spell Cards as materials
combo_steps.result: Kyrie banished, Fusion Summon Fiendsmith's Lacrima

combo_steps.effect: Target 1 LIGHT Fiend banished or in GY; add to hand or SS it
combo_steps.result: SS Fiendsmith Engraver from GY

combo_steps.effect: Link-2 using 2 monsters including a LIGHT Fiend
combo_steps.result: Sequence on field, Lacrima Fusion + Engraver to GY

combo_steps.effect: Fusion Summon 1 Fiend Fusion by shuffling materials from GY into Deck
combo_steps.result: Fusion Summon Aerial Eater (2 LIGHT Fiends shuffled)

combo_steps.effect: Send 1 Fiend monster from Deck to GY
combo_steps.result: Send Buio from Deck to GY

combo_steps.action: Buio the Dawn's Light GY trigger
combo_steps.effect: If sent to GY: Add 1 Mutiny in the Sky from Deck to hand
combo_steps.result: Add Mutiny in the Sky to hand

combo_steps.effect: Link-3 using 2+ monsters including a LIGHT Fiend
combo_steps.result: Agnumday on field, Aerial Eater + Sequence to GY

combo_steps.effect: Fusion Summon 1 Fiend/Fairy Fusion by shuffling Fiend/Fairy monsters from GY into Deck
combo_steps.result: Fusion Summon Rextremende

combo_steps.effect: Discard 1 card; send 1 LIGHT Fiend from Deck or Extra Deck to GY
combo_steps.result: Discard 1, send 2nd Engraver from Deck to GY

combo_steps.action: Link Summon A Bao A Qu, the Lightless Shadow
combo_steps.effect: Link-4
combo_steps.result: A Bao A Qu on field, Rextremende + Agnumday to GY

combo_steps.effect: If sent to GY: Target 1 other Fiendsmith card in GY or banished; add it to hand
combo_steps.result: Add Kyrie from banished zone to hand

combo_steps.action: Activate A Bao A Qu effect
combo_steps.effect: Discard 1 card; SS 1 Fiend from your GY in DEF
combo_steps.result: Discard Kyrie, SS Agnumday from GY in DEF

combo_steps.effect: Target 1 LIGHT non-Link Fiend in GY; SS it, then equip this card to it (+600 ATK per Link Rating, piercing)
combo_steps.result: SS Engraver from GY, Agnumday equips to it (+1800 ATK)

combo_steps.effect: Send 1 monster equipped with Monster Card + 1 Fiend from hand/field to GY
combo_steps.result: Necroquip Princess on field, Engraver + Agnumday to GY

combo_steps.effect: Shuffle 1 other LIGHT Fiend from GY into Deck/Extra; SS this card
combo_steps.result: Shuffle other Engraver to Deck, SS this Engraver from GY

combo_steps.action: Xyz Summon D/D/D Wave High King Caesar
combo_steps.effect: Rank 6 Xyz using 2 Level 6 Fiend monsters
combo_steps.result: Caesar on field with 2 Xyz materials

monsters.name: A Bao A Qu, the Lightless Shadow
monsters.zone: Extra Monster Zone or Main Monster Zone

banished.name: Fiendsmith Kyrie
banished.notes: If not recovered, otherwise in GY if discarded for A Bao A Qu

notes: This combo uses only 1 Engraver in starting hand
Kyrie banishes itself for fusion, can be recovered by Rextremende
Multiple resources return to Extra Deck via shuffle effects
Lacrima Fusion in GY (or shuffled back) enables follow-up plays
